item.title: Jen add a quote by Sara Shepard
item.description: "She still felt like a punked-out, faux-leather-wearing, free-thinking Bratz doll in a sea of Pretty Princess of Preppyland Barbies." -- Sara Shepard

item.title: Jen add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description:
"I don't know many rules to live by,' he'd said. 'But here's one. It's simple. Don't put anything unnecessary into yourself. No poisons or chemicals, no fumes or smoke or alcohol, no sharp objects, no inessential needles--drug or tattoo--and...no inessential penises either.'
'Inessential penises?' Karou had repeated, delighted with the phrase in spite of her grief. 'Is there any such thing as an essential one?'
'When an essential one comes along, you'll know,' he'd replied." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Jen add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description:
"Once upon a time, an angel and a devil fell in love.
It did not end well." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Jen add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description: "Hope can be a powerful force. Maybe there's no actual magic in it, but when you know what you hope for most and hold it like a light within you, you can make things happen, almost like magic." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Jen add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "I am at the moment writing a lengthy indictment against our century. When my brain begins to reel from my literary labors, I make an occasional cheese dip." -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: Jen add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "I'm not going to wear a red dress," she said. "It would look stunning, My Lady," she called. She spoke to the bubbles gathered on the surface of the water. "If there's anyone I wish to stun at dinner, I'll hit him in the face." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Jen add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "I wouldn't marry Giddon to save my life," Katsa said. "Not even to save yours." "Well." Raffin's eyes were full of laughter. "I'd leave that part out." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Jen add a quote by Eric Greitens
item.description: "There were a number of definitions of courage, but now I was seeing it in its simplest form: you do what has to be done day after day, and you never quit." -- Eric Greitens

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "I stood and walked around the desk so I could stand over him. Menacingly. Like Darth Vader, only with better lung capacity." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "She's like a hurricane on crystal meth." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "I like to see the glass as half full, hopefully of jack daniels." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "A sheriff arrested me. I could be mistaken, but I'm pretty sure my men-in-uniform fetish began that day. The sheriff was hot. And he handcuffed me. I've never been the same." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "A split second later, my life flashed before my eyes, and I came to one important conclusion about it. It was fun while it lasted." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "She didn't smile back. Not even a little. I totally needed to read that book on how to win friends and influence people. But that would involve an innate desire to win friends and influence people." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "I stop fighting my inner demons. We're on the same side now. T-shirt" -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "SOME GIRLS WEAR PRADA. SOME GIRLS WEAR GLOCK 17 SHORT RECOIL SPRING-LOADED SEMIAUTOMATIC PISTOLS WITH A LOADED CHAMBER INDICATOR AND A NONSLIP GRIP. - T-SHIRT" -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "Where am I going and why am I in this handbasket? ~Bumper sticker~" -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "Lead me not into temptation. I can find it myself. (T-Shirt)" -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "if everything is coming your way, you're in the wrong lane(T-Shirt)" -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "Let me express how much I don't care on a scale from one to bite me" -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "Dear Santa, WTF..." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jen add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Jen add a quote by Meister Eckhart
item.description: "If the only prayer you said was thank you, that would be enough." -- Meister Eckhart

item.title: Jen add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Let no one ever come to you without leaving better and happier. Be the living expression of God's kindness: kindness in your face, kindness in your eyes, kindness in your smile." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Jen add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Never travel faster than your guardian angel can fly." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Jen add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "I'm a little pencil in the hand of a writing God, who is sending a love letter to the world." -- Mother Teresa
